title: How Cheryl and Liam Payne announced the happy news that they'd welcomed their first child
text:
How Cheryl and Liam Payne announced the happy news that they'd welcomed their first child The stars have welcomed a baby boy Share Liam and Cheryl baby main Share Get celebs   Could   
Cheryl and Liam Payne took to Instagram to announce the birth of their baby boy. 
The stars welcomed their first child on Wednesday, but waited until Saturday to share the news with the world. 
The former X Factor judge, 33, was first to let the cat out of the bag. 
She posted a sweet picture of Liam holding their child in his arms and wrote: "On Wednesday 22nd March Liam and I became parents to an incredibly beautiful, healthy baby boy, weighing 7lb 9 and looking like a dream. 
"Although he still doesn't have a name he is already stealing hearts. We are all madly in love and overwhelmingly happy with our little arrival. Happy Mother's Day to all the mothers around the world. A day that now has a different meaning to me forever" Read More Cheryl and Liam posted on Instagram Liam and Cheryl became parents on Wednesday (Photo: Getty) 
Liam followed by posting the same image with his own message. 
He wrote: "My close friends and family know there are very few times when I'm left speechless... wow! 
"I'm incredibly happy to welcome our new baby boy into the world, it's a moment that I will never forget for the rest of my life and my favourite memory I have so far. Read More
